# Overview
Course held at CUNEF Univesidad Bachelor during the third year of Bachelor in Business Management as an elective course. 

The course focuses of understanding of the process of data analysis and information exploration using R as the main programming language and following the essential steps in data anlytics project. 

## Topics Covered
 - R Programming 
 
 - Exploratory Data Analysis
 
 - Data Wrangling
 
 - Modelling
 
 - Communication 
 
## Course Site
You can find some course resources in the page created on purpose for teaching it with Quarto. Find it [here](https://carviagu.github.io/data_analysis_site/)
